title: The wise and ingenious companion, French and English, or, A collection of the wit of the illustrious persons, both ancient and modern containing their wise sayings, noble sentiments, witty repartees, jests and pleasant stories : calculated for the improvement and pleasure of the English and foreigners / by Mr. Boyer ...
author: Boyer, Abel, 1667-1729.
publisher: Printed by G.C. for Tho. Newborough ... and J. Nicholson ...,
